description: Customers report checkout failures when completing payment. Payment service times out after 30s. Started around 14:00 UTC. Affects payment-service. Logs show connection timeouts to the external gateway; retries are exhausting the connection pool.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Navigate to checkout with a cart containing 2+ items. 2. Select payment method and submit. 3. Wait 25–35 seconds. 4. Observe timeout error and failed order.

short_description: Card declined errors spike in production
description: Error rate for card declined responses increased from 0.1% to 2.5% over 2 hours. Logs show connection pool exhaustion to acquirer. Correlated with peak traffic between 11:00–13:00 UTC.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Run load test against payment API with 500 concurrent users. 2. Monitor card-decline error rate in CloudWatch. 3. Check connection pool metrics for acquirer service.

short_description: Rating calculation failure for bulk requests
description: Bulk rating API returns 500 for requests with more than 50 items. Stack trace points to timeout in rating-engine. Occurs consistently when item count > 50; under 50 items succeeds.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Call POST /rating/quote with body containing 51+ line items. 2. Observe 500 and timeout in rating-engine logs. 3. Repeat with 50 items – request succeeds.

description: Premium for multi-coverage policies is under-calculated. Affects policy renewals. Suspected rounding in rating-service; finance reported 3% variance on sample renewals.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Create a policy with 3+ coverage types. 2. Run premium calculation via rating API. 3. Compare to expected manual calculation. 4. Variance appears when coverage count > 2.

description: Policy validation endpoint times out under load. P99 latency > 10s. Redis cache hit rate dropped to 60% from 95%. Suspected cache key storm under high concurrency.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Send 200 concurrent requests to GET /policy/validate with varying policy IDs. 2. Observe latency percentiles in CloudWatch. 3. Check Redis cache hit rate and connection count.

description: 5xx error rate increased during 18:00–20:00 UTC. Correlated with high request volume. Possible DB connection exhaustion. Logs show "too many connections" from policy-service to RDS.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. During next peak window, monitor 5xx rate for policy-service. 2. Correlate with RDS connection count and pool saturation. 3. Reproduce with load test targeting policy read endpoints.
